nodes.text: B6-31 was an astromech droid used by the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. In 3639 BBY it was stationed in the Section X area of Belsavis, where he asked a Republic operative to check the wreckage of the Fatality cruiser in the Frozen Lake.
B6-31 was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Update 1.5.
